Name: Antonia K.
Description:
Antonia was attacked and killed on Easter Saturday by a drunken neo-Nazi in Eastern Germany after he recognised her as transsexual.

He deliberately plowed his car into her, and she died three days later from the injuries sustained in the crash. The assailant was immediately taken into custody by police. 

http://gayhistory.wikidot.com/lgbt-victims

http://students673.ucr.edu/docsserver/lgbt/trans_remembrance_display_posters.pdf

Name: Anjie Milano (Andy Rafael Milano)
Description:
Anjie's body was found in an advanced state of decomposition behind a shopping centre in the Mañongo hills.

The International Gay and Lesbian Human Rights Commission (IGLHRC)
